history.summary: Baseline lifecycle control plane and migration pipeline.
UX hardening, mapping workbench scale features, ERD and quality upgrades.
SaaS baseline: auth, tenancy model, onboarding/settings, compact context UX.
Connector preview UX fix, table pagination default 10, version metadata display, lifecycle doc alignment.
Dockerized enterprise full-stack architecture, postgres integration, and merged 0.2.1 feature line into services runtime.
PostgreSQL-backed identity/RBAC and runtime state hardening for mapping and quality control-plane data.
Alembic migration governance and immutable audit-event trail for mission-critical enterprise operations.
